div.head: The TUNOCENT project
div.p: About … team members, news section: learn about the TUNOCENT-project, its team members and activities

71 Profiles … geography, history and most notable sights of the research locations; demographics, the inhabitants’ prevalent way of life and main means of income: get an impression of the different localities; get an insight into the way people live by viewing the photos

195 Feature lists … a questionnaire that focuses on grammatical and lexical variation: get an impression of a specific variety; compare the linguistic features in various locations; filter the data by a number of categories, such as place, feature, and speaker

185 Sample texts … a text with seven sentences which provide details on everyday activities and duties: compare linguistic characteristics contained in the texts; filter the data by a number of categories, such as place, sentence number, and speaker
24 Corpus texts … transcribed narratives, ethnographic texts and conversations: read the texts and search for words within the corpus texts; listen to selected texts

Browse data (with 2683 entries) … data list with speakers and the details of locations and data type: get an impression of the immense amount of linguistic data we collected; filter the list of speakers and recordings by a number of categories, such as place, age, gender and data type
Research … lists with publications, presentations and the conference we organised; get an impression of our research activities and the various topics we addressed
